articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Day of Sun and February 16 Formed in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Day of Sun and February 16 Formed in Democratic Congo 
   Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 of Democratic Congo was inaugurated with due ceremony in Kinshasa on Jan. 8.
 The inaugural ceremony elected Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set the commemoration period from Jan. 9 to the end of April and decided to hold colorful functions for highly praising and widely introducing the exploits of the peerlessly great men during the period.

Relentless Actions against Expansion of U.S. Military Base Vowed in S. Korea
U.S. Forces Commander's Outburst under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Forces Commander's Outburst under Fire in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea reportedly remarked on Jan. 9 that should the agreement the U.S. signed with south Korea on the transfer of its military base to Phyongthaek by 2008 be not implemented due to political reasons or the financial problem, the former would stand up against it.
 The Youth and Students Solidarity of south Korea to Implement the June 15 South-North Joint Declaration in a statement on Jan. 11 said that his outcry reveals the malicious intention of the occupation force displeased with daily mounting anti-U.S. sentiment.    
 The U.S. is getting evermore pronounced in its ambition to put the Korean Peninsula under its control, as evidenced by its mock air raid exercise targeted against the north and introduction of Stealth fighter-bombers into south Korea from the outset of the new year, the statement said.
 It strongly demanded the U.S. promptly stop interfering in the internal affairs and pull its forces out of south Korea.
